subject: Calculus
title: Implicit Differentiation Basics
openingStatement: Implicit differentiation is a twist on what we already know about derivatives. We establish rules which allow us to take derivatives piece by piece, and apply these techniques as a shortcut to finding the derivative of more complex functions.
exerciseStatement: Find \(\frac{\mathrm dy}{\mathrm dx}\) by implicit differentiation.
author: Hello World
